 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <span>
 <script>
	var isChecked = "[[showTextTA]]";
	if(isChecked.length == 0){
		document.write('<input type="checkbox" name="showTextTA" id="showTextTA" /> Show');
	}else{
		document.write('<input type="checkbox" name="showTextTA" id="showTextTA" checked="true" /> Show');
	}
 </script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 <Submit>Submit</Submit>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>

 <sr>

 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://127.0.0.1:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Name>allowEditingRegion</Name>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 <Value>
 <span id="editTA">
 <script>
 var edit = "[[allowEditTA]]";
 
 if(edit == "no"){
 document.write('<input type="radio" name="allowEditTA" id="allowEditY" value="yes" /> Yes ');
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="allowEditTA" id="allowEditN" value="no" checked="true" /> No ');

 }else{
 document.write('<input type="radio" name="allowEditTA" id="allowEditY" value="yes" checked="true" /> Yes ');
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="allowEditTA" id="allowEditN" value="no" /> No ');

 }
 </script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>2</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>3</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HtmlWidget</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>0</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>4</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>

 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <XmlData>
 <Name>requiredCheckBoxRegion</Name>
 <Value>
 <span id="requiredTextarea">
 <script>
	var r = "[[requiredTA]]";
	if(r.length == 0){
		document.write('<input type="checkbox" name="requiredTA" id="requiredTA" value="on" /> Required');
	}else{
		document.write('<input type="checkbox" name="requiredTA" id="requiredTA" value="on" checked="true" /> Required');
	}
 </script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 <Submit>Submit</Submit>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>

 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://127.0.0.1:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2helpPartName>Dev2displayTextTextarea</Dev2helpPartName>
 <Dev2helpTitle>Display Text</Dev2helpTitle>
 <Dev2helpText>The label you want to show on the left of the textbox eg. "First Name". If you do not want to show a label or are doing this manually, unselect the "Show" checkbox and nothing will be displayed.</Dev2helpText>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HelpRegion</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>3</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>3</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>
 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>

 <WebServerUrl>http://localhost:1234/services/HelpRegion.wiz/instances/a212bca8-cc4a-4bf7-9b7c-111aaaf60a5e/bookmarks/dsfResumption</WebServerUrl>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2helpPartName>editTA</Dev2helpPartName>
 <Dev2helpTitle>Allow User Editing</Dev2helpTitle>
 <Dev2helpText>By default, the user can edit the text inside the Textbox. If you are in advanced mode (Click &lt;i&gt;Advanced&lt;/i&gt; in the top right hand corner of this page) you can set this to No. Doing this will disable the Textbox and not allow any alterations.</Dev2helpText>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HelpRegion</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>3</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>4</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>
 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2helpPartName>requiredTextarea</Dev2helpPartName>
 <Dev2helpTitle>Required</Dev2helpTitle>
 <Dev2helpText>To make sure the user enters something before proceeding, make sure the box is selected. Doing this will automatically place a * to the right of the Textarea to prompt the user that this input is required. Like all validation, you can handle a violation to this in the CSS area of the website. Also, the user will not be able to press a Submit button.</Dev2helpText>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HtmlWidget</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>4</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>0</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>

 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <span class="advancedRegion">
 <script>
document.writeln('[[validationOptionsInjection]]');

$('#validationTA').change(function()
{
 var idx = document.getElementById('validationTA').selectedIndex;
 if(idx == 0){
 $('#errMsgTA').css("display", "none");
 $('#Dev2validationErrMsgTA').removeClass('requiredClass');
 }else{
 $('#errMsgTA').css("display", "inline");
 $('#Dev2validationErrMsgTA').addClass('requiredClass');
 }
});
</script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 <Submit>Submit</Submit>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HtmlWidget</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>2</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>6</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>

 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <span id="errMsgTA" style="display:none;">
 <span>Validation Error Msg.</span>
 <input type="text" id="Dev2validationErrMsgTA" name="Dev2validationErrMsgTA" value="[[Dev2validationErrMsgTA]]" class="requiredClass" />
 <font color="red">*</font>
 <script>
 $(document).ready(function(){
 rebindValidation('validationTA','[[validationTA]]','errMsgTA','Dev2validationErrMsgTA');
 });

 </script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 <Submit>Submit</Submit>
 </XmlData>

 <XmlData>
 <Dev2helpPartName>validationTA</Dev2helpPartName>
 <Dev2helpTitle>Validation</Dev2helpTitle>
 <Dev2helpText>You can set validation that you want to happen on the Textarea eg. "Alphabet Letters Only" etc. Like "Required", you can handle a violation to this in the CSS area of the Website. Also, if the Textarea fails validation, the user will not be able to Press a Submit button.</Dev2helpText>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>

 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Service>LiteralControl.wiz</Service>
 <WebServerUrl>http://localhost:1234/services/LiteralControl.wiz/instances/4799d21c-75bf-4535-afc0-7d4b5e2c729d/bookmarks/447d24fe-5f6a-49d6-b52e-1702ca0fdc0b</WebServerUrl>
 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <span id="wrapTextTA">
 <script>
 var edit = "[[wrapText]]";
 
 if(edit == "yes"){
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="wrapText" id="wrapY" value="yes" checked="true" /> Yes ');
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="wrapText" id="wrapN" value="no" /> No ');
 }else{
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="wrapText" id="wrapY" value="yes" /> Yes ');
 document.write('<input type="radio" name="wrapText" id="wrapN" value="no" checked="true" /> No ');
}
</script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 <cssClass>advancedRegion</cssClass>
 <Submit>Submit</Submit>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>

 <Dev2helpPartName>wrapTextTA</Dev2helpPartName>
 <Dev2helpTitle>Wrap Text</Dev2helpTitle>
 <Dev2helpText>Yes will keep the text from moving off the area shown and start a new line of text so the user will not have to scroll to the right to see text that is off the page. No will keep all the text on one line. We are not sure why you would want a text area that did this but its standard practice to give the options. The Custom Script box on the left was built with the Yes option selected.</Dev2helpText>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>

 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://127.0.0.1:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <span id="resizeTA" class="advancedRegion">
 <script>
 var edit = "[[Dev2AllowResizeTA]]";
 
 if(edit == "no"){
 document.write('<input type="radio" name="Dev2AllowResizeTA" id="allowResizeY" value="yes" /> Yes ');
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="Dev2AllowResizeTA" id="allowResizeN" value="no" checked="true" /> No ');

 }else{
 document.write('<input type="radio" name="Dev2AllowResizeTA" id="allowResizeY" value="yes" checked="true" /> Yes ');
	document.write('<input type="radio" name="Dev2AllowResizeTA" id="allowResizeN" value="no" /> No ');

 }
 </script>
 </span>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
